subjectArea.name: PPM - Project Budgets
subjectArea.description: This is a detailed subject area that provides the ability to report on cost, revenue, margin and the changes of Budgets including tracking original, current and other versions across projects, tasks, organizations, resources, periods and associated hierarchies at line level.
subjectArea.implicitFactColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRJ - Project Budget.Budget Burdened Cost in Analytics Currency
